entry.title: PHYTO5 - Ageless Soothing & Purifying Clay Mask (Pink)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Breizh Esthetics & Salon Supply Co.
Type:
Price: 45.95 - 62.95 (2 variants)

Ageless La Cure Clay Mask is a plentiful source of natural mineralization, powered by kaolin clay silica which improves hydration, gently removes dead skin cells and toxins, improves circulation, and encourages natural regeneration. It restores balance and erases common visible signs of aging.

entry.title: PHYTO5 - Moisturizing Gel Mask - Gel Mask for All Skin Types
entry.summary:
Vendor: Breizh Esthetics & Salon Supply Co.
Type:
Price: 35.95 - 55.95 (2 variants)

Moisturizing mask. Restores and renews the cell tissue. Great for after sun care!


Skin type 
Suitable for all skin types, including the very sensitive skin. 


Main ingredients 
Aloe vera, calendula, lemon, lavender, cypress, marjoram, ylang-ylang, thyme.

Directions for use 
Apply to the face and neck, allow to work in for 10-15 minutes, rinse with warm water.

entry.title: PHYTO5 - Ageless Nourishing Cream for Dry Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: PHYTO 5
Type: Dry Skin
Price: 56.95 - 62.95 (2 variants)

This intensive treatment cream is recommended for dehydrated skin, mature skin and very cold / dry climate. It protects, moisturizes and regenerates the skin. It is to be used as a day and night treatment after cleansing and toning. Slightly massage in and the cream penetrates easily. The nourishing cream incorporates a blend of essential oils which give it a high energetic hydrating power.

entry.title: PHYTO5 - Ageless Pigmentation Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Breizh Esthetics & Salon Supply Co.
Type:
Price: 58.95

This cream is recommended to lighten the skin and uniform colour. It acts powerfully against hyper pigmentation, because of a synergy of edelweiss from the Swiss Alps, wakame (algae) and phytic acid from wheat (gluten free). The Pigmentation Cream acts on the synthesis of melanin in two ways: it lightens the hyper pigmentation, and it inhibits melanin production in order to avoid the appearance of new spots. The antioxidants in the cream also protects your skin from free radicals (pollution, smoke, sun, stress…). Its natural green and floral fragrance is a blend of jasmine, violet and mimosa.

entry.title: PHYTO 5 - Ageless La Cure - Cream & Serum Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: PHYTO 5
Type: Mature Skin
Price: 133.95

Nestled between the base of the Green Mountain and the Arabian Sea lies an ancient trade route. The roads have faded with the spice trade, but the scents of frankincense and myrrh still float on the warm sea breezes. The 5 Secrets Serum, an integral part of the innovative Ageless Kit, is rich in anti-aging active molecules and powered by the Commiphora Mukul, an ancient family member of the myrrh tree. A rejuvenating, non-invasive, natural remedy from Ayurveda, the resin mineralizes the skin and diminish wrinkles from the inside out. Once a gift for kings and queens, the myrrh based extract increases the synthesis of lipids, toning and lifting the skin from within. Naturally rich in manganese, the resin also mineralizes and protects the skin long after use. To complement Commiphora Mukul extract, The 5 Secrets Serum contains Apricot Kernel oil, rich in healthy omega 6 & 9 fatty acids as well vitamins A & E. The oil naturally softens and hydrates the skin, and is particularly effective for dry or sensitive skin. Witch Hazel Flower Water provides soothing, anti-inflammatory, and disinfectant properties. Rose essential oil heals and purifies, soothing irritation, and redness, another great benefit for dry or sensitive skin.

The 5 Secrets Cream perfectly complements the Serum in our Ageless Kit. The cream is powered by active ingredients Aquaxyl and Easyliance, nestled among a purposeful blend of organic Cupuaçu butter, oils, vitamins, and minerals. Aquaxyl is a hydrating complex of natural extracts that has proven to be incredibly potent and effective in hydrating and restructuring cells. Easyliance, an optimized blend of synergistic ingredients, is designed specifically to tighten the skin and decrease fine lines. This cream, used alongside 5 Secrets Serum, visibly tones and lifts the skin. The 5 Secrets Cream is balanced by sustainably sourced Cupuaçu and Shea butters, designed to soften skin, moisturize, and provide a boost of omega 6 & 9, vitamin C, calcium, magnesium, and iron. Squalane from olive regenerates and protects the skin. Witch Hazel and Vitamin E provide a boost of antioxidants and anti-inflammatory properties. The combination will leave your skin healthy, vibrant and revitalized.

This thoughtful duo of serum & Cream, minerals & antioxidants, ancient & high-tech, targets all 5 core aspects of aging. Also known as the 5 Secrets of Youth. We’ve thought of everything, and in just 3 weeks your skin will be toned, vibrant, and restructured. And it will leave you looking and feeling more youthful and beautiful.

  • Powered by Commiphora Mukul extract, a non-invasive and natural anti-aging compound that increases the synthesis of lipids, mineralizing the skin and filling wrinkles from the inside out
  • To use: After cleansing and toning, apply a small amount of 5 Secrets Serum once per day, preferably in the evening. Gently massage into the skin. For best results, apply 5 Secrets Cream after 5 Secrets Serum. Use the Cream twice daily in the morning and evening after cleansing and toning. Apply a small amount on the face and neck, gently massage until a thin white mask is absorbed, leaving skin hydrated, tightened, and silky smooth.
  • Developed, manufactured, and packaged in Fleurier, Switzerland and certified organic by Ecocert® and Cosmebio®.
  • Contains a minimum of 95% plant-based ingredients. Free of all GMO, parabens, sulfates, phenoxyethanol, nanoparticles, silicon, PEG, synthetic perfumes and dyes, or animal-derived ingredients. Never tested on animals.

MSRP: $266.95

Unique balance: Ancient spice trade + Swiss science

Active ingredients: Commiphora Mukul extract + Rose from Damas water flower and essential oil + Amazonian Cupuacu butter

Serum Ingredients: Rosa damascena (rose flower water), Hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel flower water), glycerin (vegetal), Acacia senegal gum, tara gum (Caesalpinia spinosa gum), apricot lernel oil, polyglyceryl-6 esters, caprylic/capric triglyceride, sodium benzoate, benzyl alcohol, sorbitol, sucrose dilaurate, sucrose laurate, sucrose trilaurate, parfum (natural origin fragrance), potassium sorbate, dehydroacetic acid, manganese PCA, geraniol, limonene, commiphora mukul resin extract, sodium hydroxide, citronellol, linalool, eugenol, farnesol.

Cream Ingredients: Aqua (water), Hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel flower water), glycerin (vegetal), octyldodecanol, glyceryl stearate, cetearyl alcohol, Theobroma grandiflorum (Cupuacu seed butter), squalane (vegetal), candelilla/jojoba/rice bran polyglyceryl-3 esters, butyrospermum parkii butter (shea butter), Acacia senegal gum extract, hydrolyzed rhizobian gum, microcrystalline cellulose and cellulose gum, xylitylglucoside, anhydroxylitol, benzyl alcohol, sodium stearoyl lactylate, tocopherol (vitamin E), xylitol, parfum (natural origin fragrance), potassium sorbate, sodium benzoate, dehydroacetic acid, geraniol, limonene, sodium hydroxide, citronellol, linalool, eugenol, farnesol

entry.title: PHYTO 5 - Phytliss Hair Conditioner
entry.summary:
Vendor: PHYTO 5
Type: All Skin Types
Price: 27.75 - 57.95 (3 variants)

A protective balm that coats hair without weighing it down, thanks to pure organic jojoba oil.  It eliminates electricity and makes hair soft and silky.  Its essential oils algae and plant extracts revitalize, hydrate and strengthen hair.

Key Ingredients: Organic Jojoba Oil, Clove, Lemon, Lavender Essential Oils, Vitamin B2.

Type: Mature Skin

Key Ingredients: Horsetail Extract, Buckwheat Extract, Eucalyptus, Juniper Essential Oils, Cider Vinegar.
